Class MemberRepository

java.lang.Object
com.lms.library.repository.MemberRepository
@Repository public class MemberRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing Member entities. Provides data access operations for library members using an in-memory store.
Since:
2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
Joel Silva

  • Constructor Details

    • MemberRepository

      public MemberRepository()
      Default constructor for MemberRepository.

  • Method Details

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()
      Initializes the repository with sample members. Called automatically after dependency injection is complete.

    • save

      public Member save(Member member)
      Saves a member to the repository. If the member has no ID, generates a new one automatically.
      Parameters:
      member - the member to save
      Returns:
      the saved member with generated ID

    • findById

      public Optional<Member> findById(Long id)
      Finds a member by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the member to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found member, or empty if not found

    • findByEmail

      public Optional<Member> findByEmail(String email)
      Finds a member by their email address (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      email - the email address to search for
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found member, or empty if not found

    • existsById

      public boolean existsById(Long id)
      Checks if a member exists with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID to check
      Returns:
      true if a member exists with the given ID, false otherwise
